name: Bruschetta

ingredients.name: to 4 garlic cloves
ingredients.original_string: 1 to 4 garlic cloves, halved or peeled and crushed, to taste

ingredients.name: extra virgin olive oil as needed
ingredients.original_string: Extra virgin olive oil as needed

ingredients.name: salt and black pepper
ingredients.original_string: Salt and black pepper to taste

instructions: Preheat the broiler or start a charcoal or wood fire. Broil or grill the bread until lightly browned on both sides. This may take less than a minute on a side; watch carefully so the bread doesn’t burn.
While it’s still hot, rub the bread with the garlic on one or both sides. Put it on a plate, then drizzle it with olive oil and sprinkle it with salt and pepper. Serve warm.
